pull.title: [0.17] backport #14409
pull.body:
Backports #14409 to the 0.17 branch.

#14409 makes the blocks directory net-specific by definition.

events.body: @hebasto This is missing the `Github-Pull:` and `Rebased-From:` info for each commit. See the [backport.py](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools/blob/master/backport.py) script.

verification.payload:
tree df9327f0c7b1ecc197138beb560cb12bd6c10172
parent 392d1382c1b1459aaea86250cecaa54b84508f2d
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1538762648 +0300
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1550862297 +0200

Make blockdir always net specific

The blocks directory is net specific by definition.

Also this prevents the side effect of calling GetBlocksDir(false) in the
non-mainnet environment.

Github-Pull: #14409
Rebased-From: c3f1821ac788e522e7558e3575150433450dcb8c

events.message:
Make blockdir always net specific

The blocks directory is net specific by definition.

Also this prevents the side effect of calling GetBlocksDir(false) in the
non-mainnet environment.

Github-Pull: #14409
Rebased-From: c3f1821ac788e522e7558e3575150433450dcb8c

verification.payload:
tree 0bce610c729e39d0c4466e255ba1d58c1c94bf23
parent 75bee859004c26bf5648701721a68d65ba4c6586
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1543588343 +0200
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1550862298 +0200

Improve blocksdir functional test.

A new node should not create an unused `blocks` directory in the root of
the data directory when `-testnet` or `-regtest` is specified.

Github-Pull: #14409
Rebased-From: e4a0c3547ed886871f8b3d51c6b4ffdb181a8b9c

events.message:
Improve blocksdir functional test.

A new node should not create an unused `blocks` directory in the root of
the data directory when `-testnet` or `-regtest` is specified.

events.body:
@fanquake 

~~Is there a way to fix "The job exceeded the maximum time limit for jobs, and has been terminated." error in [Travis job](https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/497191864)?~~
Is is necessary to be backported? It seems like a breaking change.
I don't think this is a breaking change. Otherwise this was missed in the original review
Thanks, however I don't think this needs backporting into 0.17.2.
